ComicInfo.Summary:
Mad scientist. - ✓
The US Army. - ✓
Deadliest assassin in the world. - ✓
Interdimensional being. - ✓
Super powered being from space who has been stuck in a stasis pod and driven mad from solitude with only one thing on her mind, getting her baby back at all costs. - ✓
